@@ -215,1 +215,4 @@ - * Warn about issues related to classfile contents + * Warn about issues related to classfile contents. + * + *

+ * This category is not supported by {@code @SuppressWarnings}. @@ -217,1 +220,1 @@ - CLASSFILE("classfile"), + CLASSFILE("classfile", false), @@ -263,0 +266,3 @@ + * + *

+ * This category is not supported by {@code @SuppressWarnings}. @@ -264,1 +270,1 @@ - INCUBATING("incubating"), + INCUBATING("incubating", false), @@ -287,1 +293,4 @@ - * Warn about issues relating to use of command line options + * Warn about issues relating to use of command line options. + * + *

+ * This category is not supported by {@code @SuppressWarnings}. @@ -289,1 +298,1 @@ - OPTIONS("options"), + OPTIONS("options", false), @@ -293,0 +302,3 @@ + * + *

+ * This category is not supported by {@code @SuppressWarnings}. @@ -294,1 +306,1 @@ - OUTPUT_FILE_CLASH("output-file-clash"), + OUTPUT_FILE_CLASH("output-file-clash", false), @@ -308,2 +320,3 @@ - * Such warnings cannot be suppressed with the SuppressWarnings - * annotation. + * + *

+ * This category is not supported by {@code @SuppressWarnings}. @@ -311,1 +324,1 @@ - PATH("path"), + PATH("path", false), @@ -360,0 +373,3 @@ + * + *

+ * This category is not supported by {@code @SuppressWarnings}. @@ -361,1 +377,1 @@ - TEXT_BLOCKS("text-blocks"), + TEXT_BLOCKS("text-blocks", false), @@ -394,0 +410,4 @@ + this(option, true); + } + + LintCategory(String option, boolean annotationSuppression) { @@ -395,0 +415,1 @@ + this.annotationSuppression = annotationSuppression; @@ -414,0 +435,3 @@ + + /** Does this category support being suppressed by the {@code @SuppressWarnings} annotation? */ + public final boolean annotationSuppression; @@ -507,0 +531,1 @@ + .filter(lc -> lc.annotationSuppression)
